title: Block List
body:
Hey

So, something has been super bugging me lately, I played four games this morning, and in all four of them I had multiple players blocked- 

Now we went on to lose two of these because the blocked people had just decided to afk (nothing was said to them and I had them on mute so)

I'm not mad at the stupid matching system for giving them to me, but it would be way easier for me to identify toxic players in my lobby if like, there was a notification that someone was blocked in my select, or if the block list had a search tab or something.

Right?

replies.body: now heres a complaint that rito should look at, meanwhile in amurrca, "keystones on intermediate bots plz" **128 upvotes**....
